Then again, this is the age of "I'm offended for the people who aren't really offended but I think should be offended!"  I can't wait till this bullshit ends, if it ever does.  Hopefully it does end, and soon.  It would be nice to be able to laugh at something that hasn't been thoroughly combed through and nitpicked by the PCTP (Politically Correct Thought Police).
